related_hypothesis: The 'Adset-5 WC' adset has a ROAS of 0.88, indicating a potential mismatch between the ad creative and the website conversion flow.

variations.headline: Limited Time Offer: 50% Off!
variations.primary_text: Don't miss out! Get 50% off your first order of [Product Name] for a limited time only. Experience the [Benefit 1] and [Benefit 2] that everyone is talking about. Shop now before it's too late! [Link]
variations.reasoning: Creates urgency and scarcity by highlighting a limited-time discount and encourages immediate action.

variations.headline: The Secret [Benefit] Revealed!
variations.primary_text: Discover the secret to achieving [Desired Outcome] with [Product Name]. Thousands are already experiencing [Quantifiable Result]! Click here to learn more and transform your [Area of Life] today! [Link]
variations.reasoning: Sparks curiosity by hinting at a secret and uses social proof by mentioning 'thousands' of users and a quantifiable result.

variations.headline: Join the [Product Name] Revolution!
variations.primary_text: Tired of [Problem]? [Product Name] is changing the game! See why [Number] of customers are raving about [Benefit 1] and [Benefit 2]. Get yours now and experience the difference! [Link]
variations.reasoning: Appeals to a sense of belonging and uses social proof by highlighting the number of satisfied customers and their positive experiences.
